trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around November 11th 2010
Summary: Oval Orange bright light moves down vertically from sky then moves horizontally
divs: sighting detailson thursday, nov 11 i woke up at 3:11 am and was having a hard time sleeping so i stayed in bed looking out through our panoramic window at the stars. all of a sudden an object that looked like a falling star stopped in mid air. it was a huge oval orange hue object with bright lights around the center. i woke my partner up and said "look [first name removed cms\dr] an ufo" and he looked at it and then the object moved vertically towards the east. i ran to the window in the kitchen but it was gone. i have never seen anything so big in the sky and it was so beautiful! it was surreal! i went back to bed and saw a shooting star and then i fell asleep.
